genresAdvancedInfo.name: hong kong tv drama
genresAdvancedInfo.description: "Hong Kong TV Drama" is a genre of music that has its roots in the television dramas of Hong Kong. It is characterized by its emotional and dramatic melodies, often featuring traditional Chinese instruments such as the erhu and guzheng. The music is often used to enhance the mood and atmosphere of the dramas, and has become a popular genre in its own right.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
